channel.title: Server base JUST like rs fully working?
channel.description:
Is there a server base out there that is fully working?
I'm not asking for crazy stuff like all quests or something, just these:
- Version 317. - No custom items\models. - Fully working combat. - Fully working doors. - Fixed clipping (NPC's and Players + Following) - All or most skills. - Magic autocasting.
That's all I need. If anyone knows of one that has all this, or most of it, can you please post a link?

item.title: Server base JUST like rs fully working?
item.dc:creator: @the_soul The Soul
item.source: Server base JUST like rs fully working?

item.title: Server base JUST like rs fully working?
item.dc:creator: @Scully Scully
item.description:
@Scully wrote:

DreamTeamJ:

Well whats the closest to normal runescape?

To be completely honest, any base that you download that has a large amount of content will be full of bugs and issues. There’s practically nothing that’s a pure ready to host and you’ll be aye okay. What I can suggest you do is that you download a decent base that doesn’t have much content, you’re best off with Runesource or Hyperion, and one that has some content. From there you can look at how things are done in other servers and write your own system you see fit. If you don’t know much about programming this is the perfect opportunity to learn. At first using Hyperion may seem like a scurry thing to do, just go through it and you’ll be glad you worked on a base that’s clean and done properly. Go team venture.

Read full topic

@DreamTeamJ wrote:

Scape-JAVA:

You won’t really get this unless you do some work yourself, however there is a massive sticky list that you can browse through and find what you like.

Yea I know. All I need is the basics. If there aren’t any npc’s then thats fine. I’m expecting to be working on this project for a while anyways.
